nodes.label: message
nodes.text: When Person1 was in on MM/DD/YYYY for his visit, the nurse had said that she was going to check to see if he could get his blood thinner medication at Org3 pharmacy cheaper. I was just wondering if she had followed up on that. Thank you,   Person2
